properties.name: Vaughan Open Area
properties.description: Open area suitable for recreational drone flight. Follow Transport Canada regulations.
properties.restrictions: Follow Transport Canada basic safety rules. Maximum altitude 400 feet AGL.

properties.name: Richmond Hill Recreation Area
properties.description: Designated area for recreational drone activities. Always maintain visual line of sight.
properties.restrictions: Daylight operations only. Respect privacy and property rights.

properties.name: Mississauga West Open Space
properties.description: Open recreational area suitable for drone flight under Transport Canada regulations.
properties.restrictions: Recreational flight only. Stay clear of populated areas.
